code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import recipes from'./Recipe';import GroceryList from'./GroceryList';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{src}=_ref;const[showGroceryList,setShowGroceryList]=useState(false);const toggleGroceryList=()=>{setShowGroceryList(!showGroceryList);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:src,alt:"McDonald's Logo",className:"header-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/addRecipe",children:"Add Recipes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dropbtn",children:"Recipes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dropdown-content",children:recipes.map(recipe=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/recipe/".concat(recipe.index),children:recipe.title},recipe.index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleGroceryList,className:"grocery-list-button",children:showGroceryList?'Hide Grocery List':'Show Grocery List'}),showGroceryList&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GroceryList,{toggleGroceryList:toggleGroceryList})]})]});};export default Navbar;
